DOC.brief_summary: Patients with skin injury treated with Umbilical Cord Blood-derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells,such as deep burn damaged sweat glands,Effectiveness of Umbilical Cord Blood-derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells in Regeneration of Sweat Glands and Body Repair is determined.
DOC.brief_title: Umbilical Cord Blood-derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells in Regeneration of Sweat Glands and Body Repair
